bibl.title: Was Epinician Poetry Performed at Panhellenic Sanctuaries?
bibl.note: A reexamination of Pindar's and Bacchylides' epinician odes has found no evidence for the common assertion that many of these poems were first performed at the Panhellenic sanctuaries, and some of them can be shown to provide strong textual evidence that they were performed rather in the polis of the victor. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Christopher C. Eckerman, Was Epinician Poetry Performed at Panhellenic Sanctuaries?

A reexamination of Pindar's and Bacchylides' epinician odes has found no evidence for the common assertion that many of these poems were first performed at the Panhellenic sanctuaries, and some of them can be shown to provide strong textual evidence that they were performed rather in the polis of the victor. - Avec résumé en anglais.
